overview:
Jason Hinkle is the VP of Development at Eventric, a Chicago-based company that provides software and services to touring entertainment acts.

Eventric’s flagship product “Master Tour” is used by many of the top touring music artists in the world.

Prior to joining Eventric, Jason was President of VerySimple Custom Software, a Chicago-based consulting firm. VerySimple provided software development services to clients in a variety of industries including insurance, healthcare, state government and marketing.
